recipe.title: Neapolitan Dairy-free Milkshake Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: In a blender, combine frozen bananas, dairy-free vanilla ice cream, dairy-free milk, and ice cubes.
Evenly distribute mixture into 3 cups, rough ¾ cup (200 ml) each. Set one cup to the side.
Add one mixture back in the blender and add strawberries. Mix until well blended and set aside.
Add the last mixture in the blender and add cocoa powder. Mix until well blended and set aside.
In a cup, pour chocolate mixture first. Using a spoon, pour the strawberry mixture onto the spoon and spread it around the glass. Using a spoon, pour the vanilla mixture on top.

Set one cup to the side.

Mix until well blended and set aside.
Add the last mixture in the blender and add cocoa powder.
Mix until well blended and set aside.
In a cup, pour chocolate mixture first.
Using a spoon, pour the strawberry mixture onto the spoon and spread it around the glass.
Using a spoon, pour the vanilla mixture on top.
